text: Yakuonaonape, kwaliji kwana kukwenu chimanyilo (cha chikulupusyo cha Allah) m’mikutula jiŵili jajasimangene (pa ngondo ja Badri), nkutula ŵine waputaga ngondo petala lya Allah sano wineo waliji wachikafili, (makafiligo) galiji nkwaona (Asilamuo kuti ali ŵajinji) pakulandanya ni muŵaŵelele ŵanganyao winji wakaŵili pa kulola kwameso (kutendaga nambo Asilamuo ali ŵapanandi). Sano Allah akun'dimbanganyaga ni chikulupusyo Chakwe jwansachile, chisimu mu yalakweyo mwana kuchetelela kusyene kwa ŵakwete meso (gakulolechesya mwa umanyilisi)
